subpages.title: Group Exercises
subpages.summary: Applicants are placed into groups and expected to solve a problem by working together and agreeing on a solution within a set time limit

subpages.title: Technical Assessments
subpages.summary: Technical assessments are used to test an applicant's technical knowledge by solving problems or completing tasks

subpages.title: Presentations
subpages.summary: Recruiters can ask applicants to prepare presentations individually or as a group
